title.en: How do I start a private Susu group?

summary.en: Walk through the creation wizard to set your circle's size, cadence, and invites.

en: Open the Groups tab and use the Create Private Group action to launch the four-step setup wizard.
Give your circle a friendly name, define how many members will participate, and select the contribution amount everyone will send each cycle.
Pick how frequently payouts rotate and whether new members need verification before joining.
Add invitees with their name and mobile number. We'll stage the invitations until you're ready to kick off the group.
On the final step, confirm the start date, payout order, and invite list before saving.
Once confirmed, invitees move into the pending list where you can send reminders and mark them as joined when they accept.

title.en: How can I keep a goal on track?

summary.en: Use milestones, automatic nudges, and boosts to stay aligned with your timeline.

en: Each goal highlights 25%, 50%, and 75% milestones. Celebrate these wins and review how much remains to reach 100%.
If you fall behind schedule, the deadline sort helps spotlight goals needing extra attention.
From the goal detail screen, add a boost that immediately updates progress and logs a matching wallet transaction.
Boosts that cross a milestone will trigger a notification and badge so you can share the good news.
Enable goal nudges in Profile → Preferences to receive reminders ahead of major target dates.
Review the contribution history to understand how consistent your deposits have been over time.

title.en: What happens when I deposit funds?

summary.en: Deposits update your wallet balance immediately and log a compliant receipt.

en: Deposits can be initiated from Home or Transactions. Pick a supported mobile money provider and enter the amount you'd like to top up.
Review estimated fees and references before you submit.
After confirming, your wallet balance increases instantly in the app while the transaction history adds a new entry with status, channel, and reference ID.
You'll also see a wallet notification so statements stay synced when exports arrive.

title.en: Why was my withdrawal placed on hold?

summary.en: Compliance checks can pause payouts while we verify account details or limits.

en: If you enable the hold toggle during a withdrawal, we'll flag the request for manual review.
You'll receive a pending notification while our team verifies identity and transfer limits.
Once cleared, the transaction status updates automatically and you get a confirmation message.
If the request cannot be completed, the transaction timeline explains what to fix before trying again.

title.en: How do I keep my account secure?

summary.en: Use two-step verification, biometrics, and trusted device reviews to stay protected.

en: Turn on two-step verification under Profile → Security to confirm new sign-ins.
Enable biometric sign-in for faster but secure access on your trusted devices.
Check trusted devices regularly and revoke access you no longer recognize.
We'll send you transaction alerts and savings nudges so unusual activity gets your attention right away.
